issuetype.name: Bug

fields.description:
On the first time that I pin-left the grouped column, it appears to the left of the lock pinned columns, but when I drag the Grouped column back to the right side (to be unpinned) and then select Pinned Left again, it appears to the right (as expected) of the lock pinned columns.

1. Open plunkr https://plnkr.co/edit/T91jRFNZq1sMXuePJZ7q?p=preview 
2. Pin Grouped Column to "Left" - notice that it appears left of locked columns 
3. Drag Grouped Column to right side of "locked" area designated by dark vertical line. 
4. Pin Grouped Column to "Left" - notice now that it appears right of locked columns
fields.summary: Pinning, moving and unpinning the column results in the wrong place.

fields.description:
Vue warn]: $attrs is readonly.

found in

---> <AgGridVue>
       <App>
         <Root>

[Vue warn]: $listeners is readonly.

---> <AgGridVue>
       <App>
         <Root>

[Vue warn]: Avoid mutating a prop directly since the value will be overwritten whenever the parent component re-renders. Instead, use a data or computed property based on the prop's value. Prop being mutated: "rowData"

found in

---> <AgGridVue>
       <App>
         <Root>

issuetype.name: Bug

fields.description:
ALBERTO - NOTE - it was not my intention to support pinned row selection. This is not a bug, more a feature we have not implemented. Pinned rows are not part of the row model. Can we get back to the user and where they ask "is it possible to selected pinned rows" we just say "no it's not possible"?

I have updated the docs. I said that sorting, filtering, selection and grouping are not supported in pinned rows.
